name: Schnitzel Sandwich
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Pork schnitzel fresh from Haass Family Butcher Shop, red onion, honey-lemon vinaigrette on arugula, Haus Dijonnaise sauce on kaiser roll

name: German Street Doner
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Marinated pork from Haass Family Butcher Shop with tzatziki sauce, tomato, red cabbage, and lettuce on pita

name: German Street Doner w/ Chicken
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Marinated & seasoned chicken breast with tzatziki sauce, tomato, red cabbage, and lettuce on pita. Comes with small side of Haus fries

name: Falafel Doner
description:
Comes with small side of Haus fries
Falafel balls, tzatziki sauce, tomato, red cabbage and lettuce on pita

name: Berliner Schnitzel
description: Pork schnitzel fresh from Haass Family Butcher Shop, red onion, arugula with side of Berliner potato salad
